definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Unfortunately, there are a lot of people who still fall for such despicable mottos .
sentences.chinese: 不幸地，仍然有很多人们跌倒在这样可鄙的座右铭前。

sentences.english: My motto is All that glitters is not gold, which is said by Shakespear.
sentences.chinese: 我的座右铭是莎士比亚的那句闪光的不全是金子。

sentences.english: All fifty states in America have mottos.
sentences.chinese: 在美国所有五十个州的座右铭。

sentences.english: I begin to read Wu Danru's Mottoes of Optimists.
sentences.chinese: 开始看吴淡如的《乐观者的座右铭》。

sentences.english: There is life, not just weight loss is the motto of many Panyou.
sentences.chinese: “生命不息，减肥不止”是很多胖友的座右铭。

sentences.english: It might as well be an industry motto.
sentences.chinese: 这也很可能是整个食品行业的座右铭。

sentences.english: These two sentences have already been the mottos in English reading comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 这两句英语名言已成为英语阅读理解时的座右铭了。

sentences.english: "Love them and leave them" was the motto of the amorous Don Juan.
sentences.chinese: “爱她们随后抛弃她们”是风流浪荡子唐璜的座右铭。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang's motto is:"making lawyers' coronet of honor with thorns".
sentences.chinese: 他的座右铭是“用荆棘编织律师的荣誉之冠”。

sentences.english: But then I don’t like mottos and have never had one.
sentences.chinese: 但我不喜欢座右铭，且从来就没有座右铭。

sentences.english: But then I don’t like mottos and have never had one.
sentences.chinese: 但我不喜欢座右铭，且从来就没有座右铭。

sentences.english: Have you remembered 10 sentences of motto or faith in Success today?
sentences.chinese: 我今天有没有记10句成功学座右铭或成功学信念？

sentences.english: The motto of people with a Yellow character is "I have to do fast and well".
sentences.chinese: 黄色性格的人的座右铭是“我要做得又快又好”。

sentences.english: The motto of Sofitel is that "Life is Magnifique".
sentences.chinese: 索菲特品牌的座右铭是“生活无限精彩”。

sentences.english: This motto can make you confident.
sentences.chinese: 这个座右铭可以使你自信。

definition: mastery of study lies in diligence (idiom). You can only master a subject by assiduous study./Excellence in work is only possible with diligence./Practice makes perfect.
quotation (from a book or existing source)
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
pinyin: you3 zhi4 zhe3 shi4 jing4 cheng2

definition: no end to learning (idiom); There's always something new to study./You live and learn.
one cannot achieve glory and wealth without having been through trials and tribulations (proverb)/no pain, no gain
pinyin: chi1 de2 ku3 zhong1 ku3 , fang1 wei2 ren2 shang4 ren2
related.word: 吃得苦中苦，方为人上人
